findings.title: setAutomatedMarketMakerPair(address,bool) Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in setting automated market maker pair with address and boolean parameters.

findings.title: _setAutomatedMarketMakerPair(address,bool) Finding
findings.description: The _setAutomatedMarketMakerPair function allows the owner to set an automated market maker pair, which could potentially lead to unauthorized access or manipulation of the market maker pair.

findings.title: setGasPriceLimit(uint256) - Gas Price Limit Setting
findings.description: The setGasPriceLimit function allows setting a gas price limit, which can potentially lead to unexpected behavior or denial-of-service attacks if not properly validated.

findings.title: reflectionFromToken(uint256,bool) Potential Reentrancy Vulnerability
findings.description: The function reflectionFromToken(uint256,bool) may be vulnerable to reentrancy attacks due to its use of untrusted inputs.

findings.title: excludeFromReward(address) Unprotected Access
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function has public access and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized users to manipulate rewards.

findings.title: Unprotected Function: includeInReward(address)
findings.description: The 'includeInReward' function has been declared as public and can be accessed by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized users to manipulate rewards.

findings.title: _approve(address,address,uint256) Unprotected Function Call
findings.description: The _approve function allows an attacker to approve any address to spend tokens on behalf of another user without their consent.
